meanings.definition: A traditional Chinese outfit consisting of a top and pants.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother wore a beautiful samfu during the Chinese New Year celebration.
meanings.sent2: The tailor carefully crafted the samfu for the festival.
meanings.sent3: The samfu looked like a colorful rainbow dancing in the wind.
meanings.sent4: Her samfu was a symbol of her cultural heritage.
meanings.sent5: The intricate embroidery on the samfu told a story of tradition and history.

meanings.sent1: She will samfu for the special occasion next week.
meanings.sent2: It takes skill to samfu elegantly.
meanings.sent3: He decided to samfu for the costume party as a surprise.
meanings.sent4: In the play, the actor will samfu to portray the character accurately.
meanings.sent5: The fashion designer will samfu the models for the runway show.

meanings.definition: A garment worn in East Asia.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a collection of traditional samfu from different regions.
meanings.sent2: She bought a beautiful samfu during her trip to East Asia.
meanings.sent3: The samfu was a popular choice for formal events in East Asia.
meanings.sent4: The silk samfu shimmered under the lights of the event.
meanings.sent5: The samfu symbolized elegance and grace in East Asian culture.
